VERSION 0.3
- Added some example code
- Added check on "toggle" elements

VERSION 0.2
- Now handles semicolon parameters
- Added RFC verification before data output
- Added file open error checking
- Added return codes for functions
- Added more comments
- Added get_all() function to ComponentManager class
- Proper line folding/unfolding
- Standardized everything to uppercase

VERSION 0.1
- This is the inital release and should be considered beta, many more features need to be added
- Can read/write and manipulate an arbitrary iCal file in very basic ways and includes very basic enforcement of the standard
